channel.title: Autospawn.cfg proplem: having trouble adding npcs
channel.description: i put this in autospawn.cfg to add a black dragon to varrock square [code]spawn = 50 3213 3423 0 3213 3423 3213 3423 1 varrock square[/code] then i got this error Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "5 0 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1219) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:29) at server.main(server.java:28) Press any key to continue . . . what do i do?

item.title: Autospawn.cfg proplem: having trouble adding npcs
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

No, the problem is you used spaces while adding the dragon. You have to use the tab button, no spaces

Read full topic
item.source: Autospawn.cfg proplem: having trouble adding npcs

item.title: Autospawn.cfg proplem: having trouble adding npcs
item.dc:creator: @samuraiblood2 samuraiblood2
item.description:
@samuraiblood2 wrote:

go to line 29 and 1219 in npchandler.java and line 28 in server.java and try fixing the problem

Read full topic

item.title: Autospawn.cfg proplem: having trouble adding npcs
item.dc:creator: @propabad propabad
item.description:
@propabad wrote:

i put this in autospawn.cfg to add a black dragon to varrock square

spawn = 50 	3213	3423	0	3213	3423	3213	3423	1	varrock square

then i got this error
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "5
0 "
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1219)
at NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:29)
at server.main(server.java:28)
Press any key to continue . . .
what do i do?

Read full topic
